about.title: About me
about.subtitle: Hello, my name is Breno Silva, I'm going to Computer Science at UniFBV Wyden
about.p: With intermediate knowledge in Javascript, I continue to develop small FrontEnd projects using ReactJS and BackEnd projects with NodeJS in order to become a high-quality FullStack developer. Currently, my focus is on TypeScript to ensure the quality of my code and reduce common errors in data handling. I am also a strong enthusiast of the Python language and always open to new challenges.

services.title: Main Technologies
services.subtitle: Main Technologies that i use in my projects
services.reactText: ReactJS is a JavaScript framework created by Facebook (now Meta) that is used to build user interfaces (UI) in web applications.
services.typeScriptText: TypeScript is a syntactic superset of JavaScript which adds static typing
services.tailwindText: Tailwind CSS is a CSS framework that allows you to create layouts for your web applications using its utility-first structure, providing components for styling.
services.nodeText: Node.js is an open-source, cross-platform software based on Google's V8 JavaScript engine, which allows the execution of JavaScript code outside of a web browser.
